title: Isn't it apparent to Riot that % max healt true damage is just uncounterable?
body: How is this healthy at all? You cant build any sort of resistance against it. Your HP bar doesnt matter( it is legit in the name of the mechanic). I honestly don't like playing a tank thinking that I would counter any and all incoming damage for my team and being shredded by a Vayne İn 6 autos and losing the fight. I know that it has been in the game for a  long time but I hated it ever since the release of Vayne. What do you guys think?
